trailingComments.value: * * Represents an XML comment. * * An XML character reference is structured as follows, where * {content} is the text of the comment. * * <!--{content}--> * * The {content} value is a property of this node. * * XmlComment nodes cannot have any children.

left.value: content should not contain the string '--' or
left.raw: "content should not contain the string '--' or"

* * Represents an XML comment. * * An XML character reference is structured as follows, where * {content} is the text of the comment. * * <!--{content}--> * * The {content} value is a property of this node. * * XmlComment nodes cannot have any children.

*
     * Initializes a new instance of the {@link XmlComment} class.
     *
     * @param {string} content The content of the comment.

     * @returns {string} The content of the comment.

     * @param {string} content The content of the comment.

     * children.
